name: AFSoundManager
summary: iOS audio playing (both local and streaming) and recording made easy
description: iOS audio playing (both local and streaming) and recording made easy through a complete and block-driven Objective-C class. AFSoundManager uses AudioToolbox and AVFoundation frameworks to serve the audio. You can pick a local file or you can use a URL to stream the audio, or you can start recording a brand new audio file, the choice is up to you.
